content.en: Antimalarial structure-activity: Algorithms were used in various studies to investigate the relationship between the structure of certain compounds and their effectiveness as antimalarial agents. These algorithms helped researchers identify the structural requirements and features that contribute to the compounds' antimalarial activity. By using computational analysis and modeling techniques, the algorithms assisted in the design of potential new antimalarial agents with enhanced activity against drug-resistant strains of the malaria parasite.
content.da: Antimalarisk struktur-aktivitet: Algoritmer blev brugt i forskellige studier for at undersøge forholdet mellem visse forbindelsers struktur og deres effektivitet som antimalariale midler. Disse algoritmer hjalp forskere med at identificere de strukturelle krav og egenskaber, der bidrager til forbindelsernes antimalariske aktivitet. Ved at bruge computationale analyser og modelleringsmetoder assisterede algoritmerne i designet af potentielt nye antimalariale midler med forbedret aktivitet mod lægemiddelresistente stammer af malariaparasitten.
